attributes.action: ensure that Ian McCartney MP is investigated by the Police for corruption in respect of allowances.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ian McCartney has said he will stand down at the next election. He has given the reason for this as, ill health. I do not believe this should preclude him from being investigated as to his allowance claimes. He has by addmission committed a crime. He needs to be brought to book.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
